Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.mgsa

Class MgsaCalculation

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.mgsa.MgsaCalculation
public class MgsaCalculation extends Object
This class implements a model-based analysis. The description of the entire method can be found in "GOing Bayesian: model-based gene set analysis of genome-scale data"
Author:
Sebastian Bauer, Peter Robinson
See Also:
  • GOing Bayesian: model-based gene set analysis of genome-scale data

    MgsaCalculation(Ontology ontology, GoAssociationContainer goAssociations, int mcmcSteps)

    MgsaCalculation(Ontology ontology, GoAssociationContainer goAssociations, int mcmcSteps, long seed)
    If this constructor is used, then all annotated genes are taken to be the population set.

  • Constructor Details

    • MgsaCalculation

      public MgsaCalculation(Ontology ontology, GoAssociationContainer goAssociations, int mcmcSteps, long seed)
      If this constructor is used, then all annotated genes are taken to be the population set.
      Parameters:
      ontology - reference to Gene Ontology
      goAssociations - reference to contained with GO <-> gene associations
      mcmcSteps - Number of iterations of MCMC to perform

    • MgsaCalculation

      public MgsaCalculation(Ontology ontology, GoAssociationContainer goAssociations, int mcmcSteps)
      This constructor will generate a new random seed.
      Parameters:
      ontology - reference to target ontology, usually GO
      goAssociations - Container of associations to items, usually genes
      mcmcSteps - Number of MCMC steps to take

  • Method Details

    • getPopulationSetCount

      public int getPopulationSetCount()
      Returns:
      the total count of genes (items) in the population set.

    • setAlpha

      public void setAlpha(double alpha)
      Sets a fixed value for the alpha parameter.
      Parameters:
      alpha - false-positive rate of MGSA

    • setBeta

      public void setBeta(double beta)
      Sets a fixed value for the beta parameter.
      Parameters:
      beta - false-negative rate of MGSA

    • setAlpha

      public void setAlpha(MgsaParam.Type alpha)
      Sets the type of the alpha parameter.
      Parameters:
      alpha - false-positive parameter for MGSA algorithm

    • setAlphaBounds

      public void setAlphaBounds(double min, double max)
      Sets the bounds of the alpha parameter.
      Parameters:
      min - minimum value of the false-positive rate of MGSA
      max - maximum value of the false-positive rate of MGSA

    • setBeta

      public void setBeta(MgsaParam.Type beta)
      Sets the type of the beta parameter.
      Parameters:
      beta - false-negative parameter for MGSA algorithm

      Parameters:
